resources.string: Set all the above using the camera of your device
Server settings have been saved successfully
Display public server settings to be read by a friend with a camera to join this server
Display public server settings and private key to be read by another device of yours with a camera to sync
No users found for his host
A server error occurred, make sure the master password is valid
A cryptographic error occurred, make sure the master password is valid
Check digit mismatch, make sure the master password is valid
Your client is too old to handle the server response. Please update your client.
Would you like to try again?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s from %2$s This cannot be undone.
Password has been copied to the clipboard
The old password was restored; tap [Save new password] below to replace it with the new password again, if you change your mind
The new password was saved; tap [Undo password change] below to replace it with the old password again, if you change your mind
A new password was generated for this user and copied to the clipboard; tap [Save new password] below to make this permanent after you\'ve changed the password on the site
Please try again and report this error if this persists
AndroSphinx is set as your AutoFill provider
Set AndroSphinx to provide AutoFill services
Tap here to open the relevant setting
This could be because of the manufacturer or your employer\'s decision
Try upgrading to a newer OS version
The amount of time to wait before removing passwords copied to the clipboard (0 = disabled)

This device already has its own SPHINX secret key, which differs from the one scanned from the QR code. If you already stored credentials on this device using this app, those will be inaccessible without a backup. Are you sure you want to overwrite your key with the one from the QR code?
SPHINX cannot save arbitrary passwords by design
This master password is %1$s as it could be guessed %2$s
No suitable inputs were found for SPHINX AutoFill
Password will be removed from the clipboard in %d second(s)

Androsphinx lets you 
 ‚Ä¢ generate strong passwords and 
 ‚Ä¢ synchronize them between all your devices. 
 
To configure a SPHINX server, pair your device to a desktop computer running SPHINX or set up AutoFill, tap ‚öôÔ∏è above. 
 
To generate or retrieve passwords, you have three options: 
 
1. Set up AutoFill and use a compatible browser 
 
2. Use the Share option in your browser and choose Androsphinx as the target 
 
3. Tap üîç in the top bar and enter the domain name
